Description: Continuously passively regenerates Health, rate increases when Health is low
Spawns Health Boosters when Repkit starts and ends
When Health is below 20%, has a 50% chance to refill 1 Repkit Charge
On use, grants immunity to the last received Elemental Damage type for 7 seconds
This Repkit has 3 Charges, and a 30% chance to refill 1 Charge on enemy kill
Repkit Duration increased by +100%, and Cooldown reduced by -50%
On kill, converts 100% of overkill damage into a healing orb that seeks nearby allies
On use, gain +30% Fire Rate and +30% Movement Speed for 15s. Taking damage reduces Repkit Cooldown by 2s
Automatically regenerates Health during Fight For Your Life
